CustomField.description: This is to capture account department and which is used in initial approval biz flow configurations
CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Account_Name__r.Department__c, "Dubai Logistic City"), "Dubai Logistic City", IF(INCLUDES(Account_Name__r.Department__c, "Aviation City"), "Aviation City", IF(INCLUDES(Account_Name__r.Department__c, "Business Park"), "Business Park", IF(INCLUDES(Account_Name__r.Department__c, "Business Center"), "Business Center", ""))))
CustomField.label: Account Department
